mapper.sql: select id, title, content, cover_img, `state`, category_id, create_user, create_time, update_time from article
mapper.insert: insert into article(title, content, cover_img, `state`, category_id, create_user, create_time, update_time) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{coverImg}, #{state}, #{categoryId}, #{createUser}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update article set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, cover_img = #{coverImg}, `state` = #{state}, category_id = #{categoryId}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from article where id = #{id} and create_user = #{createUser}
